I found THAT neighborhood bar in Barcelona.  Darkly lit, wood tables and hipsters.  Alas, rosemary potatoes a must, fresh savory and sweet crepes.  Cava averages 3 Euro for a bottle two glasses worth.  Fresh fruit for home spun slushy daqueries a must aligned w frescas and watermelon.  During the day one can sit in the plaza for people watching.  Love the painted decor of peacocks on the walls.PS The burger cooked perfect medium rare with veal and lamb a must.
